trait.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The kiddywidget doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The kiddywidget makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it is {@condition grappled} by the kiddywidget (escape {@dc 8}).

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage plus 2 ({@damage 1d4}) lightning damage.
